content: Nicole A. Vargas-Fuentes is a graduate student at the Language Science Department at the University of California, Irvine. Her research focuses on how variation in the language experience can affect the relationship between bilingualism and cognition. She works as a graduate student and team leader at the Bilingualism, Mind, and Brain lab directed by Dr. Judith Kroll and as a graduate student and lab coordinator at El Areyto lab directed by Dr. Julio Torres.
summary: Nicole A. Vargas-Fuentes is a graduate student at the Language Science Department at the University of California, Irvine. Her research focuses on how variation in the language experience can affect the relationship between bilingualism and cognition.
title: Nicole A. Vargas-Fuentes
